verses.verse: Make a joyful <S%H7321>noise<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, all you <S%H776>lands<s%>.

<S%H3045>Know<s%> you that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> he is <S%H430>God<s%>: it is he that has <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5971>us<s%>, and not we ourselves; we are his people, and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of his <S%H4830>pasture<s%>.

<S%H935>Enter<s%> into his <S%H8179>gates<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>, and into his <S%H2691>courts<s%> with <S%H8416>praise<s%>: be <S%H3034>thankful<s%> unto <S%H1288>him<s%>, and bless his <S%H8034>name<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>; his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>; and his <S%H530>truth<s%> endures to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
